text: Mendoza is the capital city of the Mendoza Province in Argentina. It is the 4th largest city in Argentina (after Buenos Aires, CÃ³rdoba and Rosario). == Population == It has about 111,000 inhabitants, with another 848,660 more inhabitants in the city area. ==References== Category:Cities in Argentina Category:Capitals of Argentine provinces Category:Mendoza Province
title: Mendoza
